means: 方程式( equation的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Equations are generally written with a two-bar equals sign.
sentence.Network_cn: 等式通常用两道横的等号来表示。

sentence.Network_en: Einstein's equations showed the Universe to be expanding.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在膨胀。

sentence.Network_en: The overwhelming majority of nonlinear differential equations are not soluble analytically.
sentence.Network_cn: 绝大多数非线性微分方程是不能用解析方法求解的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: a new solution to homogeneous linear difference equations with constant coefficients ., 常系数齐次线性差分方程组的一个新解法.
approximate inertial manifolds for long-short equations长短波方程组的近似惯性流形
the convergence property of the reflected backward stochastic differential equations ., 带反射边界的倒向随机微分方程解的收敛性.
equations 滴定方程, equations 线性方程, equations 热平衡

list.abs: 机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... 逆矩阵 inverse matrix 线性方程组 linear equations 概率 probability.
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... algebraic 代数的 algebraic equation 代数方程 algebraic expression 代数式.
数学英语词汇大全_百度文库 ... 一次方程 simple equation 二次方程 quadratic equation 三次方程 cubic equation.
会计专业英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 会计分期 accounting periods 会计等式 accounting equation 会计本质 nature of accounting.

entry.def: An equation is a mathematical statement saying that two amounts or values are the same, for example 6x4=12x2.

entry.tran: （多种因素需加以综合考虑的）平衡，综合体
entry.def: An equation is a situation in which two or more parts have to be considered together so that the whole situation can be understood or explained.

example.ex: The equation is simple: research breeds new products...
example.tran: 情况很简单：研究产生新产品。

example.ex: The party fears the equation between higher spending and higher taxes...
example.tran: 该党担心难以平衡更多支出和更高税率之间的综合关系。

auth_sentence.content: House heating systems are usefully designed using these equations.

auth_sentence.content: We can use higher degree equations for better predictions.
